body:
On a healthy test cluster the health check looks like this:

```
2015/07/07 16:55:50 Running: Ginkgo tests
Setting up for KUBERNETES_PROVIDER="gce".
Project: kubernetes-jenkins-pull
Zone: us-central1-f
Running Suite: Kubernetes e2e suite
===================================
Random Seed: 1436313351 - Will randomize all specs
Will run 50 of 95 specs

Running in parallel across 15 nodes

P [PENDING]
Namespaces
/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/namespace.go:119
  Delete ALL of 100 namespace in 150 seconds
  /go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/namespace.go:118
------------------------------
SSSSSSSSS
------------------------------
[BeforeEach] Events
  /go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/events.go:42
>>> testContext.KubeConfig: /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/kubernetes-pull-build-test-e2e-gce/workspace@4/.kube/config
[It] should be sent by kubelets and the scheduler about pods scheduling and running
  /go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/events.go:134
STEP: creating the pod
```

On a failed cluster it looks like this:

```
2015/07/07 16:05:17 Running: Ginkgo tests
Setting up for KUBERNETES_PROVIDER="gce".
Project: kubernetes-jenkins-pull
Zone: us-central1-f

     -------------------------------------------------------------------
    |                                                                   |
    |  Ginkgo timed out waiting for all parallel nodes to report back!  |
    |                                                                   |
     -------------------------------------------------------------------

[1] >>> testContext.KubeConfig: /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/kubernetes-pull-build-test-e2e-gce/workspace@3/.kube/config
[1] INFO: Waiting up to 10m0s for all pods (need at least 0) in namespace 'kube-system' to be running and ready
[1] INFO: 9 / 60 pods in namespace 'kube-system' are running and ready (5 seconds elapsed)
[1] INFO: POD                      NODE                    PHASE   CONDITIONS
[1] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-0bgli  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []
[1] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-0ztda  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []
[1] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-2n6cv  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []

...

[15] INFO: 9 / 60 pods in namespace 'kube-system' are running and ready (600 seconds elapsed)
[15] INFO: POD                      NODE                    PHASE   CONDITIONS
[15] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-0bgli  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []
[15] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-0ztda  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []
[15] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-2n6cv  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []
[15] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-2wnx4  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []
[15] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-4zkhd  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []
[15] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-599zc  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []
[15] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-62j8f  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []
[15] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-62k1d  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []
[15] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-671fn  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []
[15] INFO: kibana-logging-v1-6g5ew  pull-e2e-2-minion-row7  Failed  []
```

labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

milestone.description: Issues that need to be resolved for v1.0 of Kubernetes.
milestone.title: v1.0

title: Cluster health check sometimes fails due to failed kibana-logging pods (Ginkgo timed out waiting for all parallel nodes to report back! )
